column1: public  officer.  Thirdly,  he  could  obtain  an  authorisation  by  the  Surveyor

S.C. Appeal Nos. 85/2021 with 86/2021 an: to  engage  in  land  survey  under  the  latter’s  supervision.  The

column1: distinction made by the statutory provisions, as I have already referred to
